message: Let's make a deal Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for you to take now before inflation eats away at your share!
I'll take $55, and you can have $45. It's a fair compromise, and we can avoid further inflation eating away at the money.
Bob, the value is decreasing with every round.  I'll take $55, you take $45. Let's wrap this up before it shrinks further.
